016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.entity;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.api.DomainEvent;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.api.DomainEvents;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.context.DomainEventMetadata;
021
022import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
023import java.lang.reflect.Method;
024import java.util.ArrayList;
025import java.util.HashMap;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.Map;
028import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
029
030public abstract class Entity<SNAPSHOT extends EntitySnapshot> {
031
032    private static final Map<Class<?>, Map<Class<?>, Method>> handleMethods = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
033    private static final Map<Class<?>, Map<Class<?>, Method>> applyMethods = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
034
035    private final List<com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.api.DomainEvent> changes = new ArrayList<>();
036
037    protected DomainEventMetadata metadata;
038
039    public abstract SNAPSHOT getSnapshot();
040
041    protected void setSnapshot(SNAPSHOT snapshot) {
042        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown snapshot");
043    }
044
045    protected void before(Command command)
046            throws Exception
047    {
048    }
049
050    protected void after(Command command)
051            throws Exception
052    {
053    }
054
055    public DomainEvents handle(DomainEventMetadata metadata, SNAPSHOT snapshot, Command command)
056            throws Throwable {
057        this.metadata = metadata;
058        setSnapshot(snapshot);
059
060        Method handleMethod = handleMethods.computeIfAbsent(getClass(), clazz ->
061        {
062            Map<Class<?>, Method> aggregateCommandMethods = new HashMap<>();
063            for (Method method : getClass().getDeclaredMethods()) {
064                if (method.getName().equals("handle") &&
065                        Command.class.isAssignableFrom(method.getParameterTypes()[0])) {
066                    method.setAccessible(true);
067                    aggregateCommandMethods.put(method.getParameterTypes()[0], method);
068                }
069            }
070            return aggregateCommandMethods;
071        }).get(command.getClass());
072
073        if (handleMethod == null) {
074            throw new IllegalArgumentException("No handle method for command type " +
075                    command.getClass().getName());
076        }
077
078        // Handle command
079        try {
080            before(command);
081            handleMethod.invoke(this, command);
082            after(command);
083        } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
084            if (e.getTargetException() instanceof IllegalArgumentException iae) {
085                throw iae;
086            }
087
088            throw new IllegalArgumentException(e.getCause().getMessage(), e.getCause());
089        } catch (Exception e) {
090            throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
091        }
092
093        return new DomainEvents(changes);
094    }
095
096    protected void add(DomainEvent event) {
097        if (event != null) {
098            applyEvent(event);
099            changes.add(event);
100        }
101    }
102
103    private void applyEvent(DomainEvent event) {
104        Method applyMethod = applyMethods.computeIfAbsent(getClass(), clazz ->
105        {
106            Map<Class<?>, Method> aggregateEventMethods = new HashMap<>();
107            for (Method method : getClass().getDeclaredMethods()) {
108                if (method.getName().equals("apply") &&
109                        DomainEvent.class.isAssignableFrom(method.getParameterTypes()[0])) {
110                    method.setAccessible(true);
111                    aggregateEventMethods.put(method.getParameterTypes()[0], method);
112                }
113            }
114            return aggregateEventMethods;
115        }).get(event.getClass());
116
117        // Apply event
118        if (applyMethod != null) {
119            try {
120                applyMethod.invoke(this, event);
121            } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
122                if (e.getTargetException() instanceof IllegalArgumentException) {
123                    throw (IllegalArgumentException) e.getTargetException();
124                }
125
126                throw new IllegalArgumentException(e.getCause().getMessage(), e.getCause());
127            } catch (Exception e) {
128                // Ignore, aggregate doesn't care about this event for snapshot purposes
129            }
130        }
131    }
132}
